summary: The module provides a set of utilities for handling MARC records in the Open Library catalog system. It includes functions for parsing MARC XML and binary data, extracting bibliographic information, and converting it into a format suitable for display or further processing. The module also includes utilities for handling language metadata, subject headings, and mnemonics.
business_intent: To enable the Open Library catalog system to parse, interpret, and display MARC records, providing a consistent and reliable way to extract bibliographic information from MARC data.
